attributes.description:
The 2015 E63s AMG 4Matic. Powered by a 5.5L twin-turbo charged V8, produces 410kW and 720Nm of torque, mated to a 7-speed automatic transmission. This stunning 2015 E63s AMG with 124 743 km is packed with extras such as:
- Dynamic LED headlights 
- Leather upholstery 
- 19 Inch AMG rims 
- Active park assist 
- Collision warning 
- Rear-end collision warning 
- Carbon fiber spoiler 
- Carbon fiber mirror housings 
- Keyless go
- AMG peformance steering wheel
- Illuminated door sill
- Cruise control 
- Electric tailgate 
- Electric seats with memory 
- Panoramic sunroof 
- Premium sounds system and much more 
Trade-ins welcome, finance available
